comments:
The target list field flashes visible when a change is made, such as a new target selected, and then 
immediately goes invisible.

Find an Ant build file, right-click and select Run Ant...  Turn on and off a target; the target list 
should be visible left of the Apply button, but it cannot be seen except very briefly.
 

3.0 M5, worked OK in M4.

This is the "Target execution order:" text widget?

To see the Target order list, resize the launch configuration dialog..it will 
remember the new size.

I have reproduced the AssertionFailedException: null argument on the Mac.
Changed summary accordingly.

The selection associated with the double click event can be empty. I could not 
get this on Windows but I could on the Mac (did not try on linux).

If the selection is empty, we now ignore the double click event.
Change in AntTargetsTab.
Made changes to the AntView, EnvironmentTab and InstalledJREsBlock to handle 
the same case.

Verified.
Please update the build notes, Darin S.
